std::list< string > cmFile::dirRecursiveGet ( const char *  tdir,
const char *  pat 
)

Recursively gets a list of all files in a specific directory and all subdirectories, with the given patterm

  • dir The directory to search in, not neccesary with a slash at the beginning
  • pat The extension to answer to, ex. "png"
    Returns:
    A list of all filenames associated with the given suffix

std::string cmFile::execdir_strip ( const char *  file  ) 

Strips off the executable directory position of a filename.

Returns:
A string consisting of the stripped filename

const char *  filename

Appends the filename and basedir to the data directory

Gets a full script from file (text (not compiled)).

double cmFile::read_double ( PACKFILE *  fp  ) 

Reads a double float from a packfile. Reads first a 1-byte length integer, then a string of that length

Returns:
A direct conversion of the loaded string

char * cmFile::read_string ( PACKFILE *  fp  ) 

Reads a string from a packfile Reads first a 4-byte length integer, then a string of that same length

Returns:
A new memory block with the loaded string, null-terminated

Retrieves the executable directory, and appends the data directory to it.
